[[Image:Evenfall Hall Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Evenfall Hall on the island of Tarth, off the coast of Westeros.]]
'''Evenfall Hall''' is a castle in [[the Stormlands]]. It is the seat of [[House Tarth]], a vassal house holding fealty to [[House Baratheon]] of [[Storm's End]]. The castle is located east of Storm's End on the island of [[Tarth]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/storms-end/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Storm's End entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Evenfall Hall is the main stronghold of Tarth and the girlhood home of [[Brienne of Tarth]]. It is located on the western side of the island, overlooking the Straits of Tarth.
